description: Newcastle United agree to sign right-back Tino Livramento from Southampton in a deal worth £40m including add-ons.
title: Tino Livramento: Newcastle United agree £40m deal for Southampton defender
title_page: Tino Livramento: Newcastle United agree £40m deal for Southampton defender - BBC Sport
maintext: Our coverage of Newcastle United is bigger and better than ever before - here's everything you need to know to make sure you never miss a moment
